channel.title: RooneyScape || 459 || Not a remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/3NIvW.png[/img] RooneyScape will be an economy based Runescape private server based around the revision 459, although we will not be a remake we will have a couple remake like features such as a stable expierience rate a good economy quests and much more. We will strive to perfect almost every aspect of the game and make the game fun and enjoyable. Although expierience will be a tad bit hard to gain the reward is worth it and will also give you a sense of achievement. Features that you can expect would be Quests, Bosses, Dungeons, Minigames, and much more!
[QUOTE]RooneyScape was an past server ran by me and a couple friends. It was based off of Izumi's release of Prixus. This time i am wanting to recreate the fun we had on RooneyScape but on a much more better and much more complex base. I will be trying my very best to master almost every aspect of the game. Thank you![/QUOTE][/CENTER]
[b]Development team[/b]: RooneScape
YouTube: Coming Soon! Twitter: Coming Soon! Facebook: Coming Soon!
[b]Please refer to the posts below for more information![/b]

item.title: RooneyScape || 459 || Not a remake
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

Lin:

I want to play this, so hurry up Also, do you plan on making it like the one Rooneyscape you had with the home in Shilo Village? That was a ton of fun and I’d like to see something like that opposed to a RuneScape remake (I know it’s not supposed to be one but it sure does look like it :P)

Yes lin it will be almost identical to the old RooneyScape back when we were in Shilo village but this time im going to be letting the community choose the home area location vote in the poll here with the home area you think would be fit

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[07/31/2013] - Granite maul added, 3 specials, instant special attack
[07/31/2013] - Dark bow special added, descent of dragons, will always hit
[07/31/2013] - Warriors guild started currently animated warriors, and cyclops added.

Read full topic

item.title: RooneyScape || 459 || Not a remake
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

More Updates!

[08/29/2013] - The barrows minigame has been started with the correct killcount
[08/29/2013] - Inside the barrows crypt you’re minimap will be blacked out
[08/29/2013] - FightCaves has been started currently waves 1-37 work
[08/29/2013] - An amazing new Quest handling system has been added quests should be far more easier to add Converted from my old base
[08/29/2013] - Lost City has been completed!
[08/29/2013] - GlassBlowing has been completed molten glass can be blown into any glass related item
[08/29/2013] - Leather crafting is nearly finished just a few more leather based items to be added
[08/29/2013] - Dragon leather crafting finished, you may craft dragonhide into any dragon leather item with the correct amount of hides
[08/29/2013] - Smithing has been started, all bars added and nearly all items are smithable
[08/29/2013] - Wheel spinning has been completed you may spin any raw material into string or other items.









Read full topic

item.title: RooneyScape || 459 || Not a remake
item.dc:creator: @Rooneyparadise Rooneyparadise
item.description:
@Rooneyparadise wrote:

[ul][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][CENTER][FONT=Georgia][size=24pt]Content[/size][/FONT][/center]

The Red color means the feature has not been started.
The Orange color means the feature has been started but not yet completed.
The Green color means the feature has been completed.

Combat:
[list]
[li]PvP fully complete[/li]
[li]PvN fully complete[/li]
[li]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)[/li]
[li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li]
[li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li]
[li]Every weapon special attack[/li]
[li]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/li]
[li]Equipment requirements
[list][li]Weapon poisoning

Prayer:
[list]
[li]All bones bury-able[/li]
[li]All prayer’s working correctly[/li]
[li]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li]
[li]Bones on altar[/li][/list]

Mining:
[list]
[li]Empty and refilling rock’s[/li]
[li]All ore can be mined[/li]
[li]Prospecting
[list][li]Random chance of obtaining gem’s[/li]
[li]Rune essence[/li]
[li]Granite[/li]
[li]Sand-Stone[/li][/list]

Smithing:
[list]
[li]All bars can be made[/li]
[li]All bars can be forged into items[/li]
[li]All equipment can be produced[/li]
[li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/list]

Fishing:
[list]
[li]All fish can be caught[/li]
[li]Big net fishing[/li]
[li]Correct item requirements[/li]
[li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li][/list]

Cooking:
[list]
[li]Bread[/li]
[li]Pizza[/li]
[li]Pie[/li]
[li]Cake[/li]
[li]Stew[/li]
[li]Wine[/li]
[li]Tea[/li]
[li]Brewing[/li]
[li]Potatoes[/li]
[li]Diary[/li]
[li]Gnome[/li]
[li]Dough making[/li]
[li]Meat/fish[/li]
[li]Correct animation and timing used[/li]
[li]Correct burn rate[/li][/list]

Woodcutting:
[list]
[li]All tree’s cut-able[/li]
[li]Stumps and re-growing tree’s[/li]
[li]Correct axes finding and animation’s[/li]
[li]Bird’s nest[/li][/list]

Crafting:
[list]
[li]Basic crafting (Battle-staffs & cape coloring)[/li]
[li]Leather crafting[/li]
[li][color=orange]Tanning[/color][/li]
[li][color=green]Spinning wheel[/color][/li]
[li][color=red]Pottery (fired and UN-fired item’s)[/color][/li]
[li]Gem cutting[/li]
[li]Jewelry[/li]
[li][color=orange]Glass making[/color][/li][/list]

Runecrafting:
[list]
[li]All altars working[/li]
[li]Correct multiple crafting[/li]
[li]Talismans “pull” to altars[/li]
[li]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/list]

Fletching:
[list]
[li]All log’s can be fletched[/li]
[li]Bow stringing[/li]
[li]Arrow/dart making[/li][/list]

Thieving:
[list]
[li]Stall Thieving[/li]
[li]NPC Pickpocketing[/li]
[li]Correct anims & gfx[/li]
[li]Correct Re-spawn Times[/li][/list]

Herblore:
[list]
[li]All potions make-able[/li]
[li]Identifying herbs[/li]
[li]Weapon poisoning[/li][/list]

Slayer:
[list]
[li]All slayer masters[/li]
[li]All slayer Monsters[/li]
[li]Slayer gem[/li]
[li]Slayer level to attack slayer monsters[/li][/list]

Agility:
[list]
[li]Coming Soon[/li][/list]

Farming:
[list]
[li]Coming Soon[/li][/list]

Quest:
[list]
[li]Lost City[/li][/list]

Music & Sounds
[list]
[li]All skilling sounds[/li]
[li]All combat sounds[/li]
[li]Working music player and unlocking[/li]
[li]Music playing in all regions[/li]
[li]Music fade and volume control[/li][/list]

Random Events:
[list]
[li]Coming Soon[/li][/list]

Miscellaneous
[list]
[li]Coming Soon[/li][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

RooneyScape will be an economy based Runescape private server based around the revision 459, although we will not be a remake we will have a couple remake like features such as a stable expierience rate a good economy quests and much more. Although expierience will be a tad bit hard to gain the reward is worth it and will also give you a sense of achievement.
